body.p: The Board decided to require an entity to include all costs that relate directly to a contract. The Board concluded that:

li.p: including all such costs provides more useful information to users of the entity’s financial statements (paragraphs BC4–BC7);
the benefits of providing that information are likely to outweigh the costs (paragraphs BC8–BC9); and
a requirement to include all costs that relate directly to a contract is consistent with other requirements in IAS 37 and requirements in other IFRS Standards (paragraphs BC10–BC13).
